parameters.name: HostShareKeyId
parameters.description: The ID of the shared key whose information you want to modify.

parameters.name: HostShareKeyName
parameters.description: The name of the shared key.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: PassPhrase
parameters.description: The password of the private key. Specify a Base64-encoded string.

parameters.name: PrivateKey
parameters.description:
The private key. Specify a Base64-encoded string.

>  Only Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA) keys that are generated by using the ssh-keygen command and keys that are generated by using the Ed25519 algorithm are supported.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

>  For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
